name: BOB & MICHAEL
description: Bob, Michael, Timmy and Julie where having fun minding their own business until Michael heard a very strange and unusual noise, Michael then realises that there is an island across the ocean that him or his friends did not remember seeing before! Michael and Bob tell Timmy and Julie to stay where they are and not leave their island while they take a boat and go investigate this place! What happens next?!!! Well!!!! There's something TOP SECRET going on over at this mysterious island that we shall not discuss! Play the game to find out! Otherwise if we told you it wouldn't be so TOP SECRET anymore would it!
